I was downloading a file to my laptop, when my nephew accidentally disabled the wi-fi by pressing the function key. The download was paused, and it resumed when I enabled it back. However the resume button on the download list does not revert back to pause.

Reproducible: Didn't try

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Start a download
2. Disable wi-fi while the download is in progress
3. Enable wi-fi

Actual Results:  
The download resumed, but the resume button still persists

Expected Results:  
The resume button should have been changed to pause
comments.creator: salvadesswaran@live.com
